posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 批改网闪光词汇收录中
posts.text: 批改网这个鉴东西… 亮点词汇whereas : 然而 闪光短语 cope with : 应对；处理 make light of : 轻视 too…to… : 太……以致不能…… addicted to : 沉湎于 what’s more get into the habit of : 形成…习惯 come to terms with : 达成协议 it goes without saying that ：不用说, 很明显 for certain : 肯定地 there is no denying that : 不可否认的 nothing can rival : 无与伦比的 heart and soul ：全心全意 spare no effort to : 不遗余力 in a nutshell : 简而言之 far beyond : 远超出 addicted to : 沉溺于… It is universally acknowledged that : 大家都认为 make the most use of : 充分利用 take advantage of : 利用 on no account can we : 我们绝对不能 on no account : 绝对不能 for all that : 尽管, 虽然 when it comes to : 当提到 …. 时 be based on : 以…为基础 what’s more : 另外, 而且 make joint efforts : 共同努力 Needless to say : 不用说 nothing but : 只有, 仅仅是 may as well : 不妨 attach great importance to : 认为……有重要意义 only if : 只有 from person to person : 因人而异 think out in line with : 符合 by and large : 大体上 prefer to do…rather than do follow through : 坚持到底 精彩句型 there is no denying that… : 不可否认的 among various kinds of : 在各种 … 之中 of all the… I am greatly convinced that : 我深信 I am greatly assured that it is universally acknowledged that : 大家都认为 the reason why… it pays to : …是值得的 nothing can rival : …是无与伦比的 it is obyios that : 很明显 it is advisable to…
